title: Women 's average age at first marriage in Italy 2018 , by region
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Average age in the y axis.
The maximum Average age 34.7 is found at Month Aosta Valley and the minimum is found at Calabria where Average age is 30.6.
There is a difference of 4.1 between the maximum Month Aosta Valley and minimum Month Calabria.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Average age for 20 number of Months.
The Average age is highest at Month Aosta Valley and lowest at Month Calabria.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Average age in the y axis.

There is a difference of 4.1 between the maximum Month Aosta Valley and minimum Month Calabria.
max_summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Average age in each Month on the y axis.
Month Aosta Valley has the highest Average age and Calabria has the lowest Average age.
Month  has the second highest value for Average age.
The Average age of Month Aosta Valley is 1.13% larger than the minimum value at Calabria.
The Month Aosta Valley has the highest Average age, followed by , and Sardinia. Down to the Month Calabria which is the lowest.
Overall Average age has lowered over the Months.
Month Emilia-Romagna, Tuscany, and Sardinia have a similar Average age that is 33.9.
The Month Calabria tends to be 1.06 percent lower than average.
The Average age is 657.1 if we add up values of all Months.
